abstract: Since May, the chairman and chief executive of Capital One Financial has exercised more than 10,000 options every day, collecting as much as $3.4 million each week.
snippet: Since May, the chairman and chief executive of Capital One Financial has exercised more than 10,000 options every day, collecting as much as $3.4 million each week.
lead_paragraph: Richard D. Fairbank is the chairman and chief executive of Capital One Financial, the company whose ads ask, “What’s in your wallet?” Lately, the answer for Mr. Fairbank has been as much as $2 million more every week.

headline.main: What’s in His Wallet? Millions in Options
headline.print_headline: What’s in His Wallet? Millions in Options
